nodes.text: Police droids were security droids that were utilized by various law enforcement agencies to maintain order and assist flesh-and-blood police officers in their duties. They could be found on planets such as Coruscant, where the Coruscant Security Force relied heavily on the Guardian police droids to assist in policing the vast stretches of the urbanized planet. Spaceport police droids were also common in spaceports where there was limited personnel to maintain order or in deep-space facilities that maintained only a small crew and had limited life supplies.
